Symbol.Script_3D:
unID = officeCab01_unID
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then end
if NOT(gs_shadow) then shadow off
if GLOB_CONTEXT > 20 and GLOB_CONTEXT < 40 or gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then !! for Simple Model and in 3D Windoow if GLOB_CONTEXT > 20 and GLOB_CONTEXT < 40 then iResol = 3 else iResol = 8 endif else iResol = gs_resol endif
resol iResol
PEN gs_cont_pen
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Cabinet parameter transform for cabindex 2 ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if iCabIndex = 2 then drawer_num = drawer_num_2 drawerThk = drawerThk2 gs_drawerHeights = gs_drawerHeights_2 gs_knobHorPos = gs_knobHorPos_2 endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Cabinet body ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
cabinetHeight = zzyzx - baseHeight - topThk
MATERIAL gs_cabinet_mat ADD 0, drawerThk, baseHeight BLOCK a, b - drawerThk, cabinetHeight DEL 1
GOSUB 1000
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Top ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF bTopCover THEN MATERIAL count_mat ADDZ zzyzx - topThk BLOCK a, b, topThk DEL 1 ENDIF
GOSUB 2000
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Base ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
IF gs_baseType_m > 0 THEN MATERIAL gs_base_mat
IF gs_baseType_m = 1 THEN ! castor FOR k = 1 TO 2 ADD 0.02, 0.05, gs_baseHeight/2 ROTX 90 ROTY 90 RESOL 1.5 * iResol CYLIND 0.02, gs_baseHeight/2 ADDZ a - 0.06 CYLIND 0.02, gs_baseHeight/2 DEL 4 ADDY b - 0.1 NEXT k DEL 2 ELSE ADDY drawerThk BLOCK a, b - drawerThk, gs_baseHeight DEL 1 ENDIF ENDIF
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Drawers ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
ADDZ zzyzx - topThk FOR m = 1 TO drawer_num MATERIAL gs_door_mat
bottomDiff = 0 IF ABS(baseHeight) < EPS AND m = drawer_num THEN bottomDiff = 0.005
ADDZ -gs_drawerHeights[m] + bottomDiff
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 | (gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 & gs_bevel = 0) then PRISM_ 4, gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005 - bottomDiff, 0, 0, 15, a, 0, 15, a, drawerThk, 15, 0, drawerThk, 15 else addy drawerThk rotx 90 fprism_ gs_door_mat, gs_door_mat, gs_door_mat, gs_door_mat, 5, drawerThk, 45, 0.01, 0, 0, 15, a, 0, 15, a, gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005 - bottomDiff, 15, 0, gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005 - bottomDiff, 15, 0, 0, -1 del 2 endif
gosub 2000
if gs_knob_type_m <> 0 then ! --- Knob hotspots --- IF gs_editableKnobs THEN ADD a/2 + gs_knobHorPos, 0, (gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005)/2 + gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005)/4 IF iCabIndex = 1 THEN
HOTSPOT 0, 0, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 1+128 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 0, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 2 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 3 : unID = unID + 1
HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 0, 0, unID, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], 1+128 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 0, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], 2 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray[m][1], 0, -1, unID, gs_knobPosArray[m][2], 3 : unID = unID + 1
ELSE
HOTSPOT 0, 0, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 1+128 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 0, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 2 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 3 : unID = unID + 1
HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 0, 0, unID, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], 1+128 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 0, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], unID, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], 2 : unID = unID + 1 HOTSPOT gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1], 0, -1, unID, gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2], 3 : unID = unID + 1
ENDIF DEL 1 ENDIF
! --- Knob --- IF iCabIndex = 1 THEN knobXDiff = gs_knobPosArray[m][1] knobZDiff = gs_knobPosArray[m][2] ELSE knobXDiff = gs_knobPosArray_2[m][1] knobZDiff = gs_knobPosArray_2[m][2] ENDIF ADD a/2 + gs_knobHorPos + knobXDiff, 0, (gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005)/2 + gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights[m] - 0.005)/4 + knobZDiff
if gs_knob_type_m=4 or gs_knob_type_m=5 or gs_knob_type_m=6 or gs_knob_type_m=7 or gs_knob_type_m=8 then ROTY 90 endif
if gs_knob_type_m=5 or gs_knob_type_m=6 or gs_knob_type_m=7 or gs_knob_type_m=8 then addz 0.05 endif
if gs_knob_type_m=8 then roty 180 addz 0.1 endif
if gs_knob_type_m=4 then ADDz 0.05 endif
CALL "fa_knobtyp" PARAMETERS knob_size = 0.1, gs_detlevel_3D_m = gs_detlevel_3D_m, gs_knob_type_m = gs_knob_type_m, gs_resol = iResol, gs_shadow = gs_shadow, gs_cont_pen = gs_cont_pen, gs_knob_mat = gs_knob_mat
IF gs_knob_type_m=4 or gs_knob_type_m=5 or gs_knob_type_m=6 or gs_knob_type_m=7 or gs_knob_type_m=8 then del 2 endif if gs_knob_type_m=8 then del 2 endif
del 1 endif NEXT m
DEL drawer_num + 1
! ====================================================================== officeCab01_unID = unID end officeCab01_unID ! ======================================================================
1000:
roty 90 vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1 del 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1
return
2000:
vert 0, 0, 0 vert 1, 0, 0 vert 0, 1, 0 vert 0, 0, 1
coor 2, -1, -2, -3, -4
base
body -1
return
Symbol.Script_2D:
unID = officeCab01_unID
if NOT(bPartOfLayout) then call "fa_minimalspace" parameters all MSType = 1, unID = 3000
pen gs_cont_pen line_type 1 + 3 * bPartOfLayout fill gs_fill_type
if NOT(bPartOfLayout) then hotspot2 0, b, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 a/2, b, unID : unID = unID + 1 hotspot2 a/2, b/2, unID : unID = unID + 1 endif
if drawer2d then for i = 1 to drawer_num line2 0,0-0.02,a,0-0.02 add2 0,-0.02 next i del drawer_num endif
poly2_b 5, 1 + 2 * NOT(bPartOfLayout) + 4, gs_fill_pen, gs_back_pen, 0, 0, 1, a, 0, 1, a, b, NOT(bPartOfLayout), 0, b, NOT(bPartOfLayout), 0, 0, -1
if NOT(bPartOfLayout) then call "Resize_A_B_ZZYZX" parameters all
! ====================================================================== officeCab01_unID = unID end officeCab01_unID ! ======================================================================
Symbol.Script_1D:
EPS = 0.0001
CABINET = 0 SIMPLE_DESK = 1 LAYOUT_ISLAND = 2 LAYOUT_LINEAR = 3 WS_SOLO = 4
dim st_knobtypes[9] st_knobtypes[1]=`None` st_knobtypes[2]=`Style 1` st_knobtypes[3]=`Style 2` st_knobtypes[4]=`Style 3` st_knobtypes[5]=`Style 4` st_knobtypes[6]=`Style 5` st_knobtypes[7]=`Style 6` st_knobtypes[8]=`Style 7` st_knobtypes[9]=`Style 8`
dim stDrawerSchemes[5] stDrawerSchemes[1] = `Scheme 1` stDrawerSchemes[2] = `Scheme 2` stDrawerSchemes[3] = `Scheme 3` stDrawerSchemes[4] = `Scheme 4` stDrawerSchemes[5] = `Custom`
baseHeight = gs_baseHeight * (gs_baseType_m > 0)
Symbol.Script_VL:
if NOT(bPartOfLayout) then call "FM_types" parameters all
values "A" range [0.2,) values "B" range [0.2,) values "zzyzx" range [0.2,)
values "gs_detlevel_3D" `Detailed`,`Simple`,`Off` values "gs_detlevel_3D_m" 0, 1, 2
values "gs_resol" range [3,)
if gs_cont_pen=0 then parameters gs_cont_pen=7 if gs_fill_pen=0 then parameters gs_fill_pen=91
if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then hideparameter "gs_resol" endif if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then hideparameter "gs_resol", "gs_shadow"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_detlevel_3D" then if gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` then parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` then parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 if gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` then parameters gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 else if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 0 then parameters gs_detlevel_3D = `Off` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 1 then parameters gs_detlevel_3D = `Simple` if gs_detlevel_3D_m = 2 then parameters gs_detlevel_3D = `Detailed` endif
call "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = 4, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Base Parameters ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
if bPartOfLayout then gs_baseType_m = bCabBase * 2 parameters gs_baseType_m = gs_baseType_m
! lock "gs_baseType", lock "gs_baseType_m" ! hideparameter "gs_baseType", hideparameter "gs_baseType_m" else values "gs_baseType" `Off`, `Castor`, `Toe` values "gs_baseType_m" 0, 1, 2
lock "bCabBase" hideparameter "bCabBase"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_baseType" then if gs_baseType = `Off` then gs_baseType_m = 0 if gs_baseType = `Castor` then gs_baseType_m = 1 if gs_baseType = `Toe` then gs_baseType_m = 2 parameters gs_baseType_m = gs_baseType_m else if gs_baseType_m = 0 then gs_baseType = `Off` if gs_baseType_m = 1 then gs_baseType = `Castor` if gs_baseType_m = 2 then gs_baseType = `Toe` parameters gs_baseType = gs_baseType endif endif
if gs_baseType_m > 0 then values "gs_baseHeight" range (0,) else hideparameter "gs_base_mat", "gs_baseHeight" lock "gs_base_mat", "gs_baseHeight" endif
if NOT(bPartOfLayout) then if (GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_baseType" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_baseType_m" or \ GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_baseHeight") then
zzyzx = gs_baseHeight * (gs_baseType_m > 0) + topThk for i = 1 to drawer_num zzyzx = zzyzx + gs_drawerHeights[i] next i parameters zzyzx = zzyzx endif endif
! enableDrawerSchemes - possible values ! 2 - enable Scheme 1 ! 4 - enable Scheme 2 ! 8 - enable Scheme 3 ! 16 - enable Scheme 4 ! 32 - enable Custom
if enableDrawerSchemes < EPS then enableDrawerSchemes = 2 + 4 + 8 + 16 + 32
dim drawerSchemeValueList[] j = 1 for i = 1 to vardim1(stDrawerSchemes) if bittest(enableDrawerSchemes, i) then put i drawerSchemeValueList[j] = stDrawerSchemes[i] j = j + 1 endif next i
values "gs_drawerScheme_m" get(NSP) values "gs_drawerScheme" drawerSchemeValueList
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_drawerScheme" then for iDr = 1 to vardim1(stDrawerSchemes) if gs_drawerScheme = stDrawerSchemes[iDr] then gs_drawerScheme_m = iDr next iDr parameters gs_drawerScheme_m = gs_drawerScheme_m else gs_drawerScheme = stDrawerSchemes[max(gs_drawerScheme_m, 1)] parameters gs_drawerScheme = gs_drawerScheme endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Drawer Parameters ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
xDrawerKnobPosMod = 0 if gs_knob_type_m > 3 then xDrawerKnobPosMod = 0.05
if NOT(bShowDrawer1WidthParam) then lock "gs_officeCab_width" hideparameter "gs_officeCab_width" endif if NOT(bShowDrawer2WidthParam) then lock "gs_officeCab_width_2" hideparameter "gs_officeCab_width_2" endif
if bShowDrawer1Params then values "drawerThk" range [0.01,)
mainHeight = zzyzx - topThk - baseHeight values "drawer_num" range [1, MIN(6, INT(mainHeight / 0.04))] if drawer_num > MIN(6, INT(mainHeight / 0.04)) then drawer_num = MIN(6, INT(mainHeight / 0.04)) if drawer_num < 1 then drawer_num = 1
if gs_drawerScheme_m = 1 then drawerHeight = mainHeight / drawer_num for i = 1 to drawer_num parameters gs_drawerHeights[i] = drawerHeight next i
hideparameter "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6"
lock "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m = 2 then if drawer_num = 1 then gs_topDrawerH = mainHeight lock "gs_topDrawerH" parameters gs_topDrawerH = gs_topDrawerH, gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_topDrawerH else values "gs_topDrawerH" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04] if gs_topDrawerH > mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH = mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04 if gs_topDrawerH < 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH = 0.04
parameters gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_topDrawerH
drawerHeight = (mainHeight - gs_topDrawerH) / (drawer_num - 1)
for i = 2 to drawer_num parameters gs_drawerHeights[i] = drawerHeight next i endif
hideparameter "gs_bottomDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6"
lock "gs_bottomDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m = 3 then if drawer_num = 1 then gs_bottomDrawerH = mainHeight lock "gs_bottomDrawerH" parameters gs_bottomDrawerH = gs_bottomDrawerH, gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_bottomDrawerH else values "gs_bottomDrawerH" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04] if gs_bottomDrawerH > mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04 then gs_bottomDrawerH = mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04 if gs_bottomDrawerH < 0.04 then gs_bottomDrawerH = 0.04
drawerHeight = (mainHeight - gs_bottomDrawerH) / (drawer_num - 1)
for i = 1 to drawer_num - 1 parameters gs_drawerHeights[i] = drawerHeight next i
parameters gs_drawerHeights[drawer_num] = gs_bottomDrawerH endif
hideparameter "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6"
lock "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m = 4 then if drawer_num = 1 then gs_topDrawerH = mainHeight lock "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH" parameters gs_topDrawerH = gs_topDrawerH, gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_topDrawerH else if drawer_num = 2 then values "gs_topDrawerH" range [0.04, mainHeight - 0.04] if gs_topDrawerH > mainHeight - 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH = mainHeight - 0.04 if gs_topDrawerH < 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH = 0.04
gs_bottomDrawerH = mainHeight - gs_topDrawerH lock "gs_bottomDrawerH" parameters gs_bottomDrawerH = gs_bottomDrawerH, gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_topDrawerH, gs_drawerHeights[2] = gs_bottomDrawerH else values "gs_topDrawerH" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04] if gs_topDrawerH > mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH = mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04 if gs_topDrawerH < 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH = 0.04
values "gs_bottomDrawerH" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num - 2) * 0.04 - gs_topDrawerH] if gs_bottomDrawerH > mainHeight - (drawer_num - 2) * 0.04 - gs_topDrawerH then gs_bottomDrawerH = mainHeight - (drawer_num - 2) * 0.04 - gs_topDrawerH if gs_bottomDrawerH < 0.04 then gs_bottomDrawerH = 0.04
drawerHeight = (mainHeight - gs_topDrawerH - gs_bottomDrawerH) / (drawer_num - 2)
parameters gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_topDrawerH
for i = 2 to drawer_num - 1 parameters gs_drawerHeights[i] = drawerHeight next i
parameters gs_drawerHeights[drawer_num] = gs_bottomDrawerH endif endif
hideparameter "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6"
lock "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m = 5 then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_drawerScheme_m" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_drawerScheme" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "drawer_num" then if drawer_num = 1 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight endif
if drawer_num = 2 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight/2 gs_drawerH_2 = mainHeight/2 endif
if drawer_num = 3 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight/3 gs_drawerH_2 = mainHeight/3 gs_drawerH_3 = mainHeight/3 endif
if drawer_num = 4 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight/4 gs_drawerH_2 = mainHeight/4 gs_drawerH_3 = mainHeight/4 gs_drawerH_4 = mainHeight/4 endif
if drawer_num = 5 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_2 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_3 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_4 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_5 = mainHeight/5 endif
if drawer_num = 6 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_2 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_3 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_4 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_5 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_6 = mainHeight/6 endif
parameters gs_drawerH_1 = gs_drawerH_1 parameters gs_drawerH_2 = gs_drawerH_2 parameters gs_drawerH_3 = gs_drawerH_3 parameters gs_drawerH_4 = gs_drawerH_4 parameters gs_drawerH_5 = gs_drawerH_5 parameters gs_drawerH_6 = gs_drawerH_6
endif
if drawer_num = 1 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight parameters gs_drawerH_1 = gs_drawerH_1 lock "gs_drawerH_1" else values "gs_drawerH_1" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num - 1) * 0.04] endif
if drawer_num > 1 then if drawer_num = 2 then gs_drawerH_2 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 parameters gs_drawerH_2 = gs_drawerH_2 lock "gs_drawerH_2" else values "gs_drawerH_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - (drawer_num - 2) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num > 2 then if drawer_num = 3 then gs_drawerH_3 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 parameters gs_drawerH_3 = gs_drawerH_3 lock "gs_drawerH_3" else values "gs_drawerH_3" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 - (drawer_num - 3) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num > 3 then if drawer_num = 4 then gs_drawerH_4 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 - gs_drawerH_3 parameters gs_drawerH_4 = gs_drawerH_4 lock "gs_drawerH_4" else values "gs_drawerH_4" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 - gs_drawerH_3 - (drawer_num - 4) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num > 4 then if drawer_num = 5 then gs_drawerH_5 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 - gs_drawerH_3 - gs_drawerH_4 parameters gs_drawerH_5 = gs_drawerH_5 lock "gs_drawerH_5" else values "gs_drawerH_5" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 - gs_drawerH_3 - gs_drawerH_4 - (drawer_num - 5) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num > 5 then gs_drawerH_6 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1 - gs_drawerH_2 - gs_drawerH_3 - gs_drawerH_4 - gs_drawerH_5 parameters gs_drawerH_6 = gs_drawerH_6 lock "gs_drawerH_6" endif
hideparameter "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH"
lock "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH"
parameters gs_drawerHeights[1] = gs_drawerH_1 parameters gs_drawerHeights[2] = gs_drawerH_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights[3] = gs_drawerH_3 parameters gs_drawerHeights[4] = gs_drawerH_4 parameters gs_drawerHeights[5] = gs_drawerH_5 parameters gs_drawerHeights[6] = gs_drawerH_6
if drawer_num < 2 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_2" lock "gs_drawerH_2" endif if drawer_num < 3 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_3" lock "gs_drawerH_3" endif if drawer_num < 4 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_4" lock "gs_drawerH_4" endif if drawer_num < 5 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_5" lock "gs_drawerH_5" endif if drawer_num < 6 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_6" lock "gs_drawerH_6" endif
endif
for hi = 1 to drawer_num if gs_knobPosArray[hi][1] < -A/2 - gs_knobHorPos + 0.02 + xDrawerKnobPosMod then xTempKnobPos = -A/2 - gs_knobHorPos + 0.02 + xDrawerKnobPosMod parameters gs_knobPosArray[hi][1] = xTempKnobPos endif if gs_knobPosArray[hi][1] > A/2 - gs_knobHorPos - 0.02 - xDrawerKnobPosMod then xTempKnobPos = A/2 - gs_knobHorPos - 0.02 - xDrawerKnobPosMod parameters gs_knobPosArray[hi][1] = xTempKnobPos endif if gs_knobPosArray[hi][2] < -(gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/4 + 0.02 then yTempKnobPos = -(gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/4 + 0.02 parameters gs_knobPosArray[hi][2] = yTempKnobPos endif if gs_knobPosArray[hi][2] > (gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/4 - 0.02 then yTempKnobPos = (gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights[hi] - 0.005)/4 - 0.02 parameters gs_knobPosArray[hi][2] = yTempKnobPos endif next hi else lock "drawer_num", "drawerThk", "gs_drawerScheme", "gs_drawerScheme_m", "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6", "gs_knobHorPos"
hideparameter "drawer_num", "drawerThk", "gs_drawerScheme", "gs_drawerScheme_m", "gs_topDrawerH", "gs_bottomDrawerH", "gs_drawerH_1", "gs_drawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_3", "gs_drawerH_4", "gs_drawerH_5", "gs_drawerH_6", "gs_knobHorPos" endif
if bShowDrawer2Params then values "drawerThk2" range [0.01,)
values "gs_drawerScheme_2" `Scheme 1`, `Scheme 2`, `Scheme 3`, `Scheme 4`, `Custom` values "gs_drawerScheme_m_2" 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_drawerScheme_2" then if gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 1` then gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 1 if gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 2` then gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 2 if gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 3` then gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 3 if gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 4` then gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 4 if gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Custom` then gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 5 parameters gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = gs_drawerScheme_m_2 else if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 1 then gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 1` if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 2 then gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 2` if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 3 then gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 3` if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 4 then gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Scheme 4` if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 5 then gs_drawerScheme_2 = `Custom` parameters gs_drawerScheme_2 = gs_drawerScheme_2 endif
mainHeight = zzyzx - topThk - baseHeight values "drawer_num_2" range [1, MIN(6, INT(mainHeight / 0.04))] if drawer_num_2 > MIN(6, INT(mainHeight / 0.04)) then drawer_num_2 = MIN(6, INT(mainHeight / 0.04)) if drawer_num_2 < 1 then drawer_num_2 = 1
if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 1 then drawerHeight = mainHeight / drawer_num_2 for i = 1 to drawer_num_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[i] = drawerHeight next i
hideparameter "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2"
lock "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 2 then if drawer_num_2 = 1 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = mainHeight lock "gs_topDrawerH_2" parameters gs_topDrawerH_2 = gs_topDrawerH_2, gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_topDrawerH_2 else values "gs_topDrawerH_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04] if gs_topDrawerH_2 > mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04 if gs_topDrawerH_2 < 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = 0.04
parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_topDrawerH_2
drawerHeight = (mainHeight - gs_topDrawerH_2) / (drawer_num_2 - 1)
for i = 2 to drawer_num_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[i] = drawerHeight next i endif
hideparameter "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2"
lock "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 3 then if drawer_num_2 = 1 then gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = mainHeight lock "gs_bottomDrawerH_2" parameters gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = gs_bottomDrawerH_2, gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_bottomDrawerH_2 else values "gs_bottomDrawerH_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04] if gs_bottomDrawerH_2 > mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04 then gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04 if gs_bottomDrawerH_2 < 0.04 then gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = 0.04
drawerHeight = (mainHeight - gs_bottomDrawerH_2) / (drawer_num_2 - 1)
for i = 1 to drawer_num_2 - 1 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[i] = drawerHeight next i
parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[drawer_num_2] = gs_bottomDrawerH_2 endif
hideparameter "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2"
lock "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 4 then if drawer_num_2 = 1 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = mainHeight lock "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2" parameters gs_topDrawerH_2 = gs_topDrawerH_2, gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_topDrawerH_2 else if drawer_num_2 = 2 then values "gs_topDrawerH_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - 0.04] if gs_topDrawerH_2 > mainHeight - 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = mainHeight - 0.04 if gs_topDrawerH_2 < 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = 0.04
gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = mainHeight - gs_topDrawerH_2 lock "gs_bottomDrawerH_2" parameters gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = gs_bottomDrawerH_2, gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_topDrawerH_2, gs_drawerHeights_2[2] = gs_bottomDrawerH_2 else values "gs_topDrawerH_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04] if gs_topDrawerH_2 > mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04 if gs_topDrawerH_2 < 0.04 then gs_topDrawerH_2 = 0.04
values "gs_bottomDrawerH_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 2) * 0.04 - gs_topDrawerH_2] if gs_bottomDrawerH_2 > mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 2) * 0.04 - gs_topDrawerH_2 then gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 2) * 0.04 - gs_topDrawerH_2 if gs_bottomDrawerH_2 < 0.04 then gs_bottomDrawerH_2 = 0.04
drawerHeight = (mainHeight - gs_topDrawerH_2 - gs_bottomDrawerH_2) / (drawer_num_2 - 2)
parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_topDrawerH_2
for i = 2 to drawer_num_2 - 1 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[i] = drawerHeight next i
parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[drawer_num_2] = gs_bottomDrawerH_2 endif endif
hideparameter "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2"
lock "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2" endif
if gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 5 then if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_drawerScheme_m_2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_drawerScheme_2" or GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "drawer_num_2" then if drawer_num_2 = 1 then gs_drawerH_1_2 = mainHeight endif
if drawer_num_2 = 2 then gs_drawerH_1_2 = mainHeight/2 gs_drawerH_2_2 = mainHeight/2 endif
if drawer_num_2 = 3 then gs_drawerH_1_2 = mainHeight/3 gs_drawerH_2_2 = mainHeight/3 gs_drawerH_3_2 = mainHeight/3 endif
if drawer_num_2 = 4 then gs_drawerH_1_2 = mainHeight/4 gs_drawerH_2_2 = mainHeight/4 gs_drawerH_3_2 = mainHeight/4 gs_drawerH_4_2 = mainHeight/4 endif
if drawer_num_2 = 5 then gs_drawerH_1_2 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_2_2 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_3_2 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_4_2 = mainHeight/5 gs_drawerH_5_2 = mainHeight/5 endif
if drawer_num_2 = 6 then gs_drawerH_1_2 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_2_2 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_3_2 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_4_2 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_5_2 = mainHeight/6 gs_drawerH_6_2 = mainHeight/6 endif
parameters gs_drawerH_1_2 = gs_drawerH_1_2 parameters gs_drawerH_2_2 = gs_drawerH_2_2 parameters gs_drawerH_3_2 = gs_drawerH_3_2 parameters gs_drawerH_4_2 = gs_drawerH_4_2 parameters gs_drawerH_5_2 = gs_drawerH_5_2 parameters gs_drawerH_6_2 = gs_drawerH_6_2
endif
if drawer_num_2 = 1 then gs_drawerH_1 = mainHeight parameters gs_drawerH_1_2 = gs_drawerH_1_2 lock "gs_drawerH_1_2" else values "gs_drawerH_1_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - (drawer_num_2 - 1) * 0.04] endif
if drawer_num_2 > 1 then if drawer_num_2 = 2 then gs_drawerH_2_2 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 parameters gs_drawerH_2_2 = gs_drawerH_2_2 lock "gs_drawerH_2_2" else values "gs_drawerH_2_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - (drawer_num_2 - 2) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num_2 > 2 then if drawer_num_2 = 3 then gs_drawerH_3_2 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 parameters gs_drawerH_3_2 = gs_drawerH_3_2 lock "gs_drawerH_3_2" else values "gs_drawerH_3_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 - (drawer_num_2 - 3) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num_2 > 3 then if drawer_num_2 = 4 then gs_drawerH_4_2 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 - gs_drawerH_3_2 parameters gs_drawerH_4_2 = gs_drawerH_4_2 lock "gs_drawerH_4_2" else values "gs_drawerH_4_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 - gs_drawerH_3_2 - (drawer_num_2 - 4) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num_2 > 4 then if drawer_num_2 = 5 then gs_drawerH_5_2 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 - gs_drawerH_3_2 - gs_drawerH_4_2 parameters gs_drawerH_5_2 = gs_drawerH_5_2 lock "gs_drawerH_5_2" else values "gs_drawerH_5_2" range [0.04, mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 - gs_drawerH_3_2 - gs_drawerH_4_2 - (drawer_num_2 - 5) * 0.04] endif endif
if drawer_num_2 > 5 then gs_drawerH_6_2 = mainHeight - gs_drawerH_1_2 - gs_drawerH_2_2 - gs_drawerH_3_2 - gs_drawerH_4_2 - gs_drawerH_5_2 parameters gs_drawerH_6_2 = gs_drawerH_6_2 lock "gs_drawerH_6_2" endif
hideparameter "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2"
lock "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2"
parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[1] = gs_drawerH_1_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[2] = gs_drawerH_2_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[3] = gs_drawerH_3_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[4] = gs_drawerH_4_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[5] = gs_drawerH_5_2 parameters gs_drawerHeights_2[6] = gs_drawerH_6_2
if drawer_num_2 < 2 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_2_2" lock "gs_drawerH_2_2" endif if drawer_num_2 < 3 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_3_2" lock "gs_drawerH_3_2" endif if drawer_num_2 < 4 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_4_2" lock "gs_drawerH_4_2" endif if drawer_num_2 < 5 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_5_2" lock "gs_drawerH_5_2" endif if drawer_num_2 < 6 then hideparameter "gs_drawerH_6_2" lock "gs_drawerH_6_2" endif
endif
for hi = 1 to drawer_num_2 if gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][1] < -gs_officeCab_width_2/2 - gs_knobHorPos_2 + 0.02 + xDrawerKnobPosMod then xTempKnobPos = -gs_officeCab_width_2/2 - gs_knobHorPos_2 + 0.02 + xDrawerKnobPosMod parameters gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][1] = xTempKnobPos endif if gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][1] > gs_officeCab_width_2/2 - gs_knobHorPos_2 - 0.02 - xDrawerKnobPosMod then xTempKnobPos = gs_officeCab_width_2/2 - gs_knobHorPos_2 - 0.02 - xDrawerKnobPosMod parameters gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][1] = xTempKnobPos endif if gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][2] < -(gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/4 + 0.02 then yTempKnobPos = -(gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/4 + 0.02 parameters gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][2] = yTempKnobPos endif if gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][2] > (gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/4 - 0.02 then yTempKnobPos = (gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/2 - gs_knobVerPos_m * (gs_drawerHeights_2[hi] - 0.005)/4 - 0.02 parameters gs_knobPosArray_2[hi][2] = yTempKnobPos endif next hi else lock "drawer_num_2", "drawerThk2", "gs_drawerScheme_2", "gs_drawerScheme_m_2", "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2", "gs_knobHorPos_2"
hideparameter "drawer_num_2", "drawerThk2", "gs_drawerScheme_2", "gs_drawerScheme_m_2", "gs_topDrawerH_2", "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", "gs_drawerH_1_2", "gs_drawerH_2_2", "gs_drawerH_3_2", "gs_drawerH_4_2", "gs_drawerH_5_2", "gs_drawerH_6_2", "gs_knobHorPos_2" endif
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Knob Parameters ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
values "gs_knob_type_m" 0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8 ! for UI
values "gs_knobVerPos" `Top`, `Middle`, `Bottom` values "gs_knobVerPos_m" 1, 0, -1
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_knobVerPos" then gs_knobVerPos_m = 1 if gs_knobVerPos = `Middle` then gs_knobVerPos_m = 0 if gs_knobVerPos = `Bottom` then gs_knobVerPos_m = -1 parameters gs_knobVerPos_m = gs_knobVerPos_m else gs_knobVerPos = `Top` if gs_knobVerPos_m = 0 then gs_knobVerPos = `Middle` if gs_knobVerPos_m = -1 then gs_knobVerPos = `Bottom` parameters gs_knobVerPos = gs_knobVerPos endif
if bShowCommonCabParams then values "gs_knob_type" st_knobtypes
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "gs_knob_type" then for iKnob = 1 to 9 if gs_knob_type = st_knobtypes[iKnob] then gs_knob_type_m = iKnob - 1 endif next iKnob parameters gs_knob_type_m = gs_knob_type_m else gs_knob_type = st_knobtypes[gs_knob_type_m+1] parameters gs_knob_type = gs_knob_type endif
if gs_knob_type_m = 0 then lock "gs_knobHorPos", "gs_knobHorPos_2", "gs_knobVerPos", "gs_knobVerPos_m", "gs_editableKnobs", "gs_knob_mat" hideparameter "gs_knobHorPos", "gs_knobHorPos_2", "gs_knobVerPos", "gs_knobVerPos_m", "gs_editableKnobs", "gs_knob_mat" endif
values "gs_knobHorPos" range [-A / 2 + 0.02, A / 2 - 0.02] if bShowDrawer2Params then values "gs_knobHorPos_2" range [-gs_officeCab_width_2 / 2 + 0.02, gs_officeCab_width_2 / 2 - 0.02] endif else lock "gs_knob_type", "gs_knob_type_m", "gs_knobHorPos", "gs_knobHorPos_2", "gs_knobVerPos", "gs_knobVerPos_m", "gs_editableKnobs", "gs_cabinet_mat", "gs_door_mat", "gs_base_mat", "gs_knob_mat", "gs_bevel"
hideparameter "gs_knob_type", "gs_knob_type_m", "gs_knobHorPos", "gs_knobHorPos_2", "gs_knobVerPos", "gs_knobVerPos_m", "gs_editableKnobs", "gs_cabinet_mat", "gs_door_mat", "gs_base_mat", "gs_knob_mat", "gs_bevel" endif
if NOT(bShowDrawer1Params) and NOT(bShowDrawer2Params) then lock "gs_baseType", "gs_baseType_m", "bCabBase", "gs_baseHeight"
hideparameter "gs_baseType", "gs_baseType_m", "bCabBase", "gs_baseHeight" endif
Symbol.Script_UI:
textElevInfield = 4 textElevBoolean = 2 textElevMaterial = 4
infieldHeight = 19 outfieldHeight = 15
IF bOnlyDrawerUI THEN GOSUB 2000 ELSE GOSUB 1000 ENDIF
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- END ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
1000: UI_DIALOG `Office Cabinet Settings`
UI_CURRENT_PAGE gs_ui_current_page UI_PAGE gs_ui_current_page
DIM tabTitles[4] tabTitles[1] = `Drawer` tabTitles[2] = `Knobs & Base` tabTitles[3] = `Appearance` tabTitles[4] = `Minimal Space`
DIM tabIcons[4] tabIcons[1] = "ui_tab_furniture_drawer(1)" tabIcons[2] = "ui_tab_furniture_knob(1)" tabIcons[3] = "ui_tab_furniture_appearance(1)" tabIcons[4] = "ui_tab_minimalspace(1)"
FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_furniture_drawer(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_furniture_knob(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_furniture_appearance(1)" FILE_DEPENDENCE "ui_tab_minimalspace(1)"
CALL "ui_tabcontrol" parameters controlType = 1, nTabs = 4, gs_ui_current_page = gs_ui_current_page, tabTitles = tabTitles, tabIcons = tabIcons
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- UI_PAGE 1 ! Drawer ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
GOSUB 2000
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- UI_PAGE 2 ! Knobs & Base ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
y0 = 40 x1 = 5 x2 = 105 x3 = 229 x4 = 330 dy = 26 y = y0
bHideXDrawerKnobPos = 0 if gs_knob_type_m = 0 then bHideXDrawerKnobPos = 1 bHideZDrawerKnobPos = 0 if gs_knob_type_m = 0 then bHideZDrawerKnobPos = 1
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Knob`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, 18 UI_STYLE 0,0
y = y + dy
UI_OUTFIELD `Style`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_knob_type_m", x2, y, 110, 95, 2, "Knob_Types_N(13)", 12, 4, 84,118,60,80, 1,`Style 1`, 1, 2,`Style 2`, 2, 3,`Style 3`, 3, 4,`Style 4`, 4, 5,`Style 5`, 5, 6,`Style 6`, 6, 7,`Style 7`, 7, 8,`Style 8`, 8, 9,`None`, 0
y = y + 5 * dy
UI_OUTFIELD `Hor. Position`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, outfieldHeight, 4 * bHideXDrawerKnobPos UI_INFIELD "gs_knobHorPos", x2, y - textElevInfield, 110, infieldHeight y = y + dy
UI_OUTFIELD `Vert. Position`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, outfieldHeight, 4 * bHideZDrawerKnobPos UI_INFIELD "gs_knobVerPos", x2, y - textElevInfield, 110, infieldHeight
UI_SEPARATOR 222, 40, 222, 265 y = y0
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Base`, x3, y, x4-x3-1, 18 UI_STYLE 0,0
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Type`, x3, y, x4-x3-1, outfieldHeight UI_INFIELD "gs_baseType", x4, y - textElevInfield, 100, infieldHeight
y= y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Height`, x3, y, x4-x3-1, outfieldHeight UI_INFIELD "gs_baseHeight", x4, y - textElevInfield, 100, infieldHeight
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- UI_PAGE 3 ! Apperarance ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
x1 = 3 x4 = 217 x3 = x4-35 x2 = x4-120
x5 = x1+222 x6 = x2+222 x8 = x4+222 x7 = x8-80
y0 = 35 dy = 23
y = y0
UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `2D Representation`, x1, y, x4-x1, 18 UI_STYLE 0,0
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Contour Pen`, x1, y, x3-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_cont_pen", x3, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x3, 20
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Fill Type`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_type", x2, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x2, 20
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Fill Pen`, x1, y, x3-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_fill_pen", x3, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x3, 20
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Fill Background Pen`, x1, y, x3-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_back_pen", x3, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x3, 20
y = y + dy UI_INFIELD{3} "drawer2d", x1, y, x3-x1-1, 18, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Show Drawer in 2D`, 0, 1, `Show Drawer in 2D`, 1
ysep = y + dy + 2
UI_SEPARATOR 222, 40, 222, ysep-5
y = y0 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `3D Representation`, x5, y, x8-x5-1, 18 UI_STYLE 0,0
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `3D`, x5, y, x7-x5-1, outfieldHeight UI_INFIELD "gs_detlevel_3d", x7, y - textElevInfield, x8-x7, infieldHeight
y = y + dy
UI_OUTFIELD `Resolution`, x5, y, x7-x5-1, outfieldHeight UI_INFIELD "gs_resol", x7, y - textElevInfield, x8-x7, infieldHeight
y = y + dy UI_INFIELD{3} "gs_shadow", x5, y, x8-x5-1, 18, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Shadow`, 0, 1, `Shadow`, 1
UI_SEPARATOR x1, ysep, 444-x1, ysep
y = ysep + 3 UI_STYLE 0,1 UI_OUTFIELD `Surfaces`, x1, y, x4-x1, 18 UI_STYLE 0,0
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Cabinet`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_cabinet_mat", x2, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x2, 22
UI_OUTFIELD `Knob`, x5, y, x6-x5-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_knob_mat", x6, y - textElevMaterial, x8-x6, 22
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Counter`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "count_mat", x2, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x2, 22
UI_OUTFIELD `Base`, x5, y, x6-x5-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_base_mat", x6, y - textElevMaterial, x8-x6, 22
y = y + dy UI_OUTFIELD `Drawer`, x1, y, x2-x1-1, 18 UI_INFIELD "gs_door_mat", x2, y - textElevMaterial, x4-x2, 22
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- UI_PAGE 4 ! Minimal Space ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
UI_PICT 1, 150, 75, 77, 177, 1 !minSpace
UI_INFIELD "A", 158, 55, 60, 18 UI_INFIELD "B", 230, 113, 60, 18 UI_INFIELD "MSFront", 230, 200, 60, 18
RETURN
! ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- ! Drawer tabpage ! -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
2000:
xCenter = 222 yCenter = 120
xLeftStr1 = 230 - 220 Strlength1 = 110 xLeftStr2 = 345 - 220 Strlength2 = 90 yLeftStr1 = 35 yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_outfield `No. of Drawers`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "drawer_num", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "drawer_num_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
ui_outfield `Scheme`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield{3} "gs_drawerScheme_m", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 110, 2, 2, 5, 1, !ui_cab01_scheme.png 80, 90, 80, 73, 1, `Scheme 1`, 1, 2, `Scheme 2`, 2, 3, `Scheme 3`, 3, 4, `Scheme 4`, 4, 5, `Custom`, 5 else ui_infield{3} "gs_drawerScheme_m_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 110, 2, 2, 5, 1, !ui_cab01_scheme.png 80, 90, 80, 73, 1, `Scheme 1`, 1, 2, `Scheme 2`, 2, 3, `Scheme 3`, 3, 4, `Scheme 4`, 4, 5, `Custom`, 5 endif
yCurrent = 175 ui_infield{3} "gs_bevel", xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 20, 7, "", 2, 1, 20, 20, 20, 20, 0, `Edge Bevel`, 0, 1, `Edge Bevel`, 1 yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
ui_outfield `Drawer Thickness`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "drawerThk", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "drawerThk2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
if bOnlyDrawerUI then ui_outfield `Cabinet Width`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "gs_officeCab_width", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "gs_officeCab_width_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif endif
ui_separator xCenter, 32, xCenter, 265
xLeftStr1 = 230 Strlength1 = 110 xLeftStr2 = 345 Strlength2 = 90 yLeftStr1 = 35 yCurrent = yLeftStr1
ui_outfield `Drawer Heights`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, 16 yCurrent = yCurrent + 25 - textElevInfield
if (gs_drawerScheme_m = 2 and iCabIndex = 1) or (gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 2 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_outfield `Top Drawer Height`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "gs_topDrawerH", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "gs_topDrawerH_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif endif
if (gs_drawerScheme_m = 3 and iCabIndex = 1) or (gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 3 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_outfield `Bottom Drawer Height`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "gs_bottomDrawerH", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif endif
if (gs_drawerScheme_m = 4 and iCabIndex = 1) or (gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 4 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_outfield `Top Drawer Height`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "gs_topDrawerH", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "gs_topDrawerH_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif yCurrent = yCurrent + 25
ui_outfield `Bottom Drawer Height`, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, Strlength1, outfieldHeight yCurrent = yCurrent - textElevInfield if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "gs_bottomDrawerH", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight else ui_infield "gs_bottomDrawerH_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, infieldHeight endif endif
if (gs_drawerScheme_m = 5 and iCabIndex = 1) or (gs_drawerScheme_m_2 = 5 and iCabIndex = 2) then if (drawer_num = 1 and iCabIndex = 1) or (drawer_num_2 = 1 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_pict 3, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, 109, 135, 1 !drawer1 y0 = 58 endif if (drawer_num = 2 and iCabIndex = 1) or (drawer_num_2 = 2 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_pict 4, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, 109, 135, 1 !drawer2 y0 = 30 dy = 58 endif if (drawer_num = 3 and iCabIndex = 1) or (drawer_num_2 = 3 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_pict 5, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, 109, 135, 1 !drawer3 y0 = 15 dy = 45 endif if (drawer_num = 4 and iCabIndex = 1) or (drawer_num_2 = 4 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_pict 6, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, 109, 135, 1 !drawer4 y0 = 10 dy = 34 endif if (drawer_num = 5 and iCabIndex = 1) or (drawer_num_2 = 5 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_pict 7, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, 109, 135, 1 !drawer5 y0 = 5 dy = 27 endif if (drawer_num = 6 and iCabIndex = 1) or (drawer_num_2 = 6 and iCabIndex = 2) then ui_pict 8, xLeftStr1, yCurrent, 109, 135, 1 !drawer6 y0 = 3 dy = 22 endif
yCurrent = yCurrent + y0
if iCabIndex = 1 then ui_infield "gs_drawerH_1", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20
if drawer_num > 1 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num > 2 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_3", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num > 3 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_4", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num > 4 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_5", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num > 5 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_6", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif else ui_infield "gs_drawerH_1_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20
if drawer_num_2 > 1 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_2_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num_2 > 2 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_3_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num_2 > 3 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_4_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num_2 > 4 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_5_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif if drawer_num_2 > 5 then yCurrent = yCurrent + dy ui_infield "gs_drawerH_6_2", xLeftStr2, yCurrent, Strlength2, 20 endif endif endif
RETURN
